Portfolio

Zeus - Deep Reinforcement Learning Financial Tradingmore_vert

Project Presentation, Commercialized system

close

Using Path Consistency learning algorithm, learns how to trade the financial market in a probabilistic manner.
Feature engineered with technical analysis rules, market volumes. Works with broker API.
Product created while I was in General Assembly and the top student chosen to present to Assoc Prof Minister Dr. Yaacob Ibrahim.

Aynchronous Actor-Critic Networks with LSTM Reinforcement Learningmore_vert

Github

close

Built an efficient reinforcement learning algorithm using A3C outlined by Google's paper and used an LSTM model with it on Pytorch.
Tested the algorithm on Atari games, a standard benchmark and it yields one of the highest results.

Property Renovatable & Intrinsic Price Valuation, Market Strategy | Machine learningmore_vert

Github

close

Building two property valuation models using machine learning models with model stacking
Compare and contrast price prediction between the two models
Market strategy to purchase a property with high intrinsic value, with higher valuation after renovation profits after costs.

Using complex stacked deep learning and machine learning models to predict the next mosquito virus hotspots.

github

Chatoyance Trading Group - Real time group P2P trading appmore_vert

App Website

close

Share and copy trades between traders in a 2-way P2P fashion using Python, Django, SQL and the Metatrader 4 framework.
Trades made are automatically sent and updated on the website, server and sent to groups automatically opens/closes/updates their trade positions.
Provides performance and metrics per trader on the web app.

close
